channel.title: Starting up error. Something with the server IP?
channel.description:
Alright so in my server the IP is listed in a Config.java file. The line looks like:
public static String serverName = "romanmur.no-ip.org"; //Server's IP adress. EX: pkscape.no-ip.biz
BTW Client.java doesn't have the string for the input "server = server ip here" So now, after compiling, getting no errors, when i start up the client, this is what i get: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/helpbp.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/2356/helpbp.png[/img][/URL] Im guessing it's saying to do something on line 3122 in Client.Java, but what to do i don't know... I have boxed in line 3122 in RED just for you guys, so please help me out!

item.title: Starting up error. Something with the server IP?
item.dc:creator: @best_shit_out best shit out
item.description:
@best_shit_out wrote:

care to elaborate just a littttlleee more? If you mean i didnt creat it, i made my no-ip. besides that i have NO idea what youre talking about brutha.

Read full topic
item.source: Starting up error. Something with the server IP?

item.title: Starting up error. Something with the server IP?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

romanmur.no-ip.biz is not a valid host, meaning you didn’t create it or you made a typo.

Read full topic
item.source: Starting up error. Something with the server IP?
